column3: I've decided to speed up things a bit and implement the https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-149976 feature.

The implementation was pretty straightforward except for new methods in ToolWindow interface, I have some doubts about them as a way of achieving the functionality required.
The idea was to be able to pass a file, selected by user, to external modules like plugins.
I've provided a default implementation of the methods in case some external code have used the interface.
If there is something that can be improved, please let me know.
And it seems JetBrains won't do things speedily
Yeah, I wish they've commented the issue at least :)
I'm very disappointed in JetBrains on how they deal with issues and pull requests.
They have ton of issues on YouTrack but they can't manage them well even they developed YouTrack, just my own opinion.
